hymn.title: I am sinful, I am helpless

layout.singingstanza: I am sin -- ful, I am help -- less, Hum -- bly at Thy feet I bow; Full of pro -- blems, I am hope -- less, Oh, dear Sav -- ior, save me now! Save me now! save me now! Oh, dear Sav -- ior, save me now! Save me now from all my pro -- blems, Oh, dear Sav -- ior, save me now!

lyrics.stanza: I am sinful, I am helpless, Humbly at Thy feet I bow; Full of problems, I am hopeless, Oh, dear Savior, save me now! Save me now! save me now! Oh, dear Savior, save me now! Save me now from all my problems, Oh, dear Savior, save me now!
